law.catch_line: Debt adjuster to take reasonable measures to protect debtor's personal information.

text.section:
A debt adjuster shall take reasonable measures to:
Ensure the security and confidentiality of a debtor's personal information;
Protect against any anticipated threats or hazards to the security or integrity of a debtor's personal information; and
Protect against unauthorized access to or use of a debtor's personal information.

law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 86, sec. 7, effective July 15, 2010.
